svcproc.title: EOT Sensor (Engine Oil Temperature)
svcproc.para: The EOT sensor is a thermistor type sensor located in the oil filter base. The ECM monitors the EOT signal to control fuel quantity, inlet air heater operation, and timing during the operation of the engine. The EOT signal allows the ECM and IDM to compensate for differences in oil viscosity for temperature changes. This ensures that power and torque are available for all operating conditions.
